data.title: Kumon Math and Reading Center of Sunnyvale
meta_keywords: Kumon Math and Reading Center of Sunnyvale - Homestead - Cupertino
data.meta_description: Kumon Math and Reading Center of Sunnyvale - Homestead in Cupertino, CA. Kumon of Sunnyvale - Homestead is part of the world's largest after-school math & reading program, helping children of all ages become self-learners.
data.text:
Free Registartion, 10% discount for 2 subjects. Registration is free. I am Srini Potluri, Instructor at Homestead Kumon. I am a parent myself went through the Kumon program for my Son for 10 plus years. When I look back I do see the foundation Kumon provided all the years. As a parent, I do understand from the student side what difficulties they come across. I would like to provide the best of my ability to help students to excel in both Math and Reading.

Homestead Kumon - Free Orientation and Registration. For a limited time we are offering free Orientation and Registration. We are absorbing the Registration fee.. We are open for in-class and via zoom. In class on Monday and Thursday between 3:30 and 6:30 PM. I am Srini Potluri, Instructor at Homestead Kumon. I am a parent myself went through the Kumon program for my Son for 10 plus years. I graded all the assignments myself and could see the progress my Son made over the years. He went through with flying colors with college and working in the bay area. When I look back I do see the foundation Kumon provided all the years. As a parent, I do understand from the student side what difficulties they come across. I would like to provide the best of my ability to help students to excel in both Math and Reading.

Homestead Kumon - Summer Promotion. Orientation and Registration is free. We are open for in-class (limited capacity) and via zoom. Monday and Thursday in class/Zoom and Saturday Zoom session. Start May 16th to May 30th we have Free Registration, a good time for Summer classes. This is a good time for students to catch up in the summer prior to school for both Math and Reading. New management in place. Well-experienced teachers. I am Srini Potluri, Instructor at Homestead Kumon. I am a parent myself went through the Kumon program for my Son for 10 plus years. I could see the progress my Son made over the years. He went through with flying colors from a reputed university and working in the bay area. When I look back I do see the foundation Kumon provided all the years. I would like to provide the best of my ability to help students to excel in both Math and Reading.
